
## Definition


=== "Values"

    ``` yaml
    --8<-- "snippets/values/workload-common.yaml"
    --8<-- "snippets/values/cronjobs.yaml"
    ```

=== "Cronjob Manifest"

    ``` yaml
    --8<-- "snippets/manifests/cronjob/cicd-sample-docs-cleanup.yml"
    ```



`namespace`

:   secret namespace

    **default:** subsystem namespace generated by convention

`labels`

:   list of labels to add to secret in addition to [common labels](../common metadata.md)

    **default:** empty dict

`annotations`

:   list of annotations to add to secret in addition to [common annotations](../common metadata.md)

    **default:** empty dict

`spec`    

:   Cronjob kubernetes manifests `spec` field value
    **default:** 
    
    ``` yaml
    schedule: "0 0 31 2 *"
    concurrencyPolicy: Forbid
    failedJobsHistoryLimit: 1
    jobTemplate:
      spec:
        ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 86400
        template:
          spec:
            serviceAccountName: default
            restartPolicy: "Never"

    ```
